author: Dan Cardinale
comment: It looks great on my sony smartwatch 3, unfortunately it locks up forcing a reboot and change to a different face. Too bad as it looks very. Nice!

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Please email me some more details so I can review.

author: David Brooke-Durrant
comment: Love this watch face, very neat looking, well worth paying the premium price.

author: Scott Reid
comment: Looks great. Shame you can't remove some panels on the face without upgrading

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: We're a small company that strives to create stylish products to make sure you look your best. This does take time and effort though, and rather than using popup ads as a revenue stream as most free apps use, we chose to provide some limited free capabilities to show you what we can do, along with a wider range of options for a small fee.

author: Jesse Kelch
comment: Does not work trouble shooted everything possible want my money back.

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: Please email me so I can help resolve.

author: Brian Brown
comment: Great looking watchface, enough that I've already purchased premium.  My 5th premium that I've purchased from you.  I will make this 5 star if you could make it more compatible with a square watch face (Asus Zenwatch 2 1.63).  That's my only complaint is that I just don't like the round face on my square watch.  Is this by any chance possible in an update?

reply.author: DeNitE Appz
reply.content: The design aesthetic doesn't really fit a square - however, I had added a bit for square faces...

author: Robb B.
comment: Nice design overall. It would be awesome if the panels were to open and close when the watch goes in and out of ambient mode though. Because I don't see a way to make them open and close otherwise...
